backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and per-event level states with access control checks for viewing and updating data.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme color variables and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document configuring PWA metadata, icons, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, theme, icons, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, and network-first navigation handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication, event selection, game routing, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/decor/RomanticDe: UI component rendering floating hearts, flowers, or teddies as decorative background elements.
frontend/src/components/layout/PortraitF: Layout wrapper enforcing portrait-centered design with optional pattern background and install banner.
frontend/src/components/layout/PostUnloc: Header component with romantic-themed background, logo, and heart-decorated title for post-unlock screens.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallBanne: PWA install banner that shows install options, iOS instructions, and a help dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallHeart: Heart-shaped floating install button that triggers PWA install or fallback help dialog.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallHelpD: Dialog with tabbed instructions for installing the PWA on Android, iOS, and desktop.
frontend/src/components/quiz/SecretLette: Modal flow that reveals a hidden romantic letter with a themed image after user confirmation.
List of uploaded image filenames with helpers to pick deterministic or random images per level.
frontend/src/game/assets/winImageMapping: Re-exports image-level mapping utilities for game win screens.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Game constants including password, level counts, and storage key names.
frontend/src/game/content/event3LoveLaug: Array of humorous love-themed joke lines grouped into letters for event 3.
frontend/src/game/content/events.ts: Defines metadata for all events and provides a lookup function by event ID.
frontend/src/game/content/levelHints.ts: Provides a numbered map of short gameplay hints for each level.
frontend/src/game/content/loseMessages.t: Contains an array of encouraging lose messages and a helper to return one at random.
frontend/src/game/content/winLetters.ts: Defines an interface and per‑level romantic love/promise letters returned on win.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/FixedPuzzl: Implements a large configurable puzzle level with drag, press, swipe, timer, and wait mechanics based on LevelConfig.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/Level001.t: A level where the heart moves on click and the player must click the instruction text to win.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/Level002.t: A drag‑based level where pulling the sun downward switches to night and triggers win.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/Level003.t: A hold‑to‑open letter level requiring a 1.5s press, tracking attempts and triggering win on success.
frontend/src/game/levels/impl/levelConfi: Defines LevelConfig type and a large map of level numbers to instructions, solution types, and optional data for levels 4–100.
frontend/src/game/levels/levelRegistry.t: Maps level numbers to React components, using FixedPuzzleLevel with configs for levels above 3.
frontend/src/game/promisesKept/content/e: Contains full data definitions for 100 'Promises Kept' levels, including scenes, promises, actions, hints, and parameters.
frontend/src/game/promisesKept/content/l: Provides textual hint strings for each Promises Kept level keyed by level number.
Stores multiple randomized lose messages and exports a function to retrieve one.
frontend/src/game/promisesKept/content/w: Defines love and promise letters awarded per level and exports them as a numbered record.
frontend/src/game/promisesKept/levels/im: Converts event level data into PromisesKeptLevelConfig objects with default fallback.
React component implementing interactive logic for Promises Kept levels driven by config parameters.
frontend/src/game/promisesKept/levels/le: Returns a wrapped PromisesKeptPuzzleLevel component for any level using its config.
frontend/src/game/quiz/constants.ts: Defines quiz game constants for total levels, questions per level, and allowed mistakes.
frontend/src/game/quiz/content/quizLevel: Defines quiz levels with questions, options, and secret messages for each level.
frontend/src/game/quiz/types.ts: Declares TypeScript interfaces for quiz options, questions, and level structure.
frontend/src/game/storage/passwordGate.t: Provides functions to check, unlock, and manage password-gated access using localStorage.
frontend/src/game/storage/progressStorag: Handles saving, loading, and updating level progress in localStorage for the main game.
frontend/src/game/storage/promisesKeptPr: Manages progress storage for the 'Promises Kept' mode, including completion and level advancement logic.
frontend/src/game/storage/quizProgressSt: Stores and updates quiz mode progress, tracking completed and unlocked quiz levels.
frontend/src/game/storage/useProgress.ts: React hook that syncs game progress with backend and localStorage while exposing helpers for level handling.
frontend/src/game/storage/usePromisesKep: React hook for 'Promises Kept' progress, syncing with backend and clamping levels to valid ranges.
frontend/src/game/storage/useQuizProgres: React hook managing quiz progress with backend sync and level locking rules.
frontend/src/game/ui/levelBackground.ts: Generates background gradients and accent colors for levels based on themed color zones.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading, logging in, clearing identity, and exposing login status through a React provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and level state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode settings, and custom animations and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on load and logs update availability.
frontend/src/pwa/usePwaInstall.ts: Manages PWA install prompts, tracking installability, dismissal, and standalone state.
frontend/src/screens/EventDetailScreen.t: Displays romantic event details, routing to interactive screens or rendering a static fallback letter view.
frontend/src/screens/EventsHubScreen.tsx: Displays a list of interactive events and mini‑games, handling disabled states and navigation when an event is selected.
frontend/src/screens/IntroScreen.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Renders a password‑protected landing page with romantic theming, unlocking the app when the correct password is entered.
frontend/src/screens/LevelPlayScreen.tsx: Runs gameplay for level-based events, loading the correct level component, showing hints, and handling win/lose/skip actions with themed UI per event type.
frontend/src/screens/LoadingScreen.tsx: Shows a heart‑themed loading animation with a timed progress bar and triggers completion when done.
frontend/src/screens/LoseScreen.tsx: Displays a themed lose screen for two game modes, showing a random message and a retry button with animation effects.
Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/screens/QuizPlayScreen.tsx: Implements a multi‑level quiz system with questions, progress tracking, wrong‑answer limits, level completion, and secret letter reveals.
frontend/src/screens/romantic/DPBEventSc: Romantic event screen where repeated 'No' clicks cycle messages and 'Yes' triggers a celebration with photos and a hidden letter.
frontend/src/screens/romantic/LoveLaughs: Allows selecting one of 10 joke-filled letters, showing jokes in a modal with associated images.
frontend/src/screens/romantic/TogetherFo: 'No' button moves unpredictably on each click and 'Yes' leads to a celebration with photos and themed letter.
frontend/src/screens/WinScreen.tsx: Win screen with animated transition, fallback images, and different layouts for normal levels and Promises Kept event.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL params and session-stored params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with extended colors, fonts, radii, screens, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, known issues, and pending feature requests for install button and level progression fixes.
